title: the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No.
heading: 2. The 6th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 6 of
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 6 of 
the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 
14 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [152] 3

title: the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints the 6th May 2025 as the day on which section 6 of the 
Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 14 
of 2023) comes into operation. 

This section amends the Medical Practitioners Act 2007 and relates to immunity 
from prosecution for certain cohorts of persons performing functions under the 
Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [152]
